flawed_nl_solution:
Madeline needs 1200+400+200+60+200 = $<<1200+400+200+60+200=2040>>2040 to pay all of her bills.
She will need to work $2040/$15 per hour = 136.0 hours.
She will need to work 136 hours to pay all of her bills

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 2060, not 2040. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
